last_episode_to_air.name: Always Together
last_episode_to_air.overview: A collector has gotten a hold of Mii-kun. The gang works together to stop him.

name: How to Keep a Mummy
overview: Kashiwagi Sora is living a normal high school student life, when his "adventurer" father sends him a mummy from his travels in Egypt! Sora balks at the letter from his crazy dad ("I found a cool mummy, so I decided to leave it with you, son!") at first, but the mummy that emerges from inside the huge coffin is a mere 12 centimeters tall--small enough to fit in the palm of his hand... Not only that, it's shy, a crybaby, and most of all, heckin' cute. And so, Sora and ends up keeping the mummy, naming his new little buddy "Mii-kun." But living with a mummy might be easier said than done...!

episodes.name: White, Round, Tiny, Wimpy, and Ready
episodes.overview: Sora receives a package from his dad in Egypt: a huge casket with a tiny mummy. The instructions are unclear, but what’s certain is that he’s going to have to learn to take care of his new mummy, Mii-kun.

episodes.name: Toyed With and Chased Around, Being Small Is Hard
episodes.overview: Balancing school and taking care of Mii-kun turns out to be a challenge, but with a little help from his friend, Tazuki, Sora takes it on like a champ.

episodes.name: It's Scary When Someone You Care About Get's Sick
episodes.overview: Sora comes down with the flu. Kaede and Mii-kun are desperate to help, but his strong sense of independence makes him a little difficult to care for.

episodes.name: You Can't Play Tag by Yourself, and It's Fun to Play With Others
episodes.overview: Tazuki encounters a child oni on his way home from work. Though the oni appears to be beat up pretty badly, Tazuki refuses to take him in.

episodes.name: Go Away Kindness, Go Away Fear
episodes.overview: Mogi comes home to a tiny dragon hanging out in her room. This is terrible news to her, as she has a fear of lizards.

episodes.name: I Can't Grow All at Once, So I'll Grow Over Time
episodes.overview: Mii-kun, Conny and Isao learn to write – kind of. Kaede’s mandrake gets loose, and the gang sets out to bring it home before the unthinkable happens.

episodes.name: Scary Dreams Are Okay Because I'm Not Alone
episodes.overview: A student with a menacing look threatens the gang. There seems to be something wrong with him. Sora offers him his help.

episodes.name: New Places, Strange Places, Strange Friends
episodes.overview: The gang finds a perfect babysitter for their creatures. From there, Mii-kun sets out on an unintended adventure.

episodes.name: Kind Hands, Warm Hands
episodes.overview: Conny has developed some bad habits, including stealing food from the family. His relationship with Tazuki becomes strained.

episodes.name: A Surprise From Afar
episodes.overview: Sora’s dad sends him another gift. It doesn’t seem to be dangerous in any way, but it sure is talkative.

episodes.name: I Want to Be With You Forever and Ever
episodes.overview: Sora’s classmate, Suzuki, shows him a photo of an injured inugami. Sora and the gang head out to the mountains to find it.

episodes.name: Always Together
episodes.overview: A collector has gotten a hold of Mii-kun. The gang works together to stop him.
